      • BulletinArea

        public BulletinArea(int no,
                    java.lang.String name,
                    int x,
                    int y,
                    int width,
                    int height)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        no - The No. of the bulletin, from 0 to 99.
        name - The name.
        x - The x coordinate of the area.
        y - The y coordinate of the area.
        width - The width of the area.
        height - The height of the area.
